thread.section_title: Egerton House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent weekend away
thread.title_full: Excellent weekend away - Review of Egerton House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: schofieldma
title: Excellent weekend away
text: You read it in the other reviews and its true. The staff could not be more friendly and the rooms are excellent. The Hotel is in a great location for a weekend away, close to all the attractions in Knightsbridge, but it is also so easy from South Kensington tube station to get across London.
